summary.span: Represents the per-user personalization information for a page and a user.

span.span: Represents the per-user personalization information for a page and a user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类可以基于每个用户，用于确定单个用户的个性化设置有关的统计信息。This class can be used on a per-user basis to determine statistical information about an individual user's personalization settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `lastActivityDate`参数指示用户已经 ASP.NET 应用程序中处于活动状态的最后一个时间。The `lastActivityDate` parameter indicates the last time the user was active in the ASP.NET application. 可以通过其他 ASP.NET 功能，例如成员资格和配置文件中更新此日期。This date can be updated by other ASP.NET features, such as Membership and Profile. `path` 和`username`如果非修剪`null`。`path` and `username` are trimmed if non-`null`.

summary.span: Gets the last time the user was active in the ASP.NET application associated with a page.

span.span: Gets the last time the user was active in the ASP.NET application associated with a page.

value.span: 用户处于与页面关联的 ASP.NET 应用程序中处于活动状态的最后一个时间。

span.span: The last time the user was active in the ASP.NET application associated with a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可观测的值的用户是否是作为一个整体应用程序中仍处于活动状态。This property can be used as an indicator of whether a user is still active in the application as a whole. 可以通过其他 ASP.NET 功能，例如成员资格和配置文件中更新此日期。This date can be updated by other ASP.NET features, such as Membership and Profile.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性查找给定用户的统计个性化状态信息。You can use the property to find statistical personalization state information for a given user.
